sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by grants from Special Fund for Agro-scientific Research in the Public Interest (No. 201503134, 201303059), China Agriculture Research System (No. CARS-39-18), the major science and technology projects of Gansu Province (No. 17ZD2NC020), as well as projects of Lanzhou Science & Technology Bureau (No. 2012â€“2-159). None of the funders had any role in design and conduct of the study; collection, management, analysis, and interpretation of the data; and preparation, review, or approval of the manuscript.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: Metagenome sequences generated were entered into the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) under accession numbers SRA: SRP149856.
